description.value:
Skills: +2 to Crafting, Energy Weapons, and Medicine.

Trait: Wasteland Knowledge

What they don't tell you about being a book organizer is

the faster you do it, the more time you get to read. You've

spent countless hours organizing a trove of information

that you wish you could share with the entire world. The

accumulation of knowledge from these texts could better

the world if raiders would stop to read a chapter. You're

venturing into the wasteland to share your knowledge, or

to find more to add to your collection.

Starting Equipment.

• Human, Ghoul, or Super Mutant Scientist

x1 cloth armor, x1 laser pistol, x2 energy cell, x1 backpack, x1

sleeping bag, x1 one person tent, x3 cram, x2 purified water, x1

diluted RadAway, x1 Rad-X, x1 stimpak, and x50 caps.

• Gen-2 Synth or Robot Scientist

x1 cloth armor, x1 laser pistol, x2 energy cell, x1 backpack, x2

RobCo Quick Fix-it 2.0, x1 Programmer's Digest magazine, x1

data scrubber, and x50 caps
